5c647281-afc4-4386-ac4f-8891d7dd4929.description: Individuals that have earned the Cherwell Certified Professional Administrator (CCPA) certification have obtained the required knowledge and technical skills to effectively administrate Cherwell's ITSM solution, Cherwell Service Management. f3c89e97-7d1e-4f82-b949-7907b386e15b
5c647281-afc4-4386-ac4f-8891d7dd4929.name: Cherwell Certified Professional Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Pass an online proctored exam on administrating Cherwell Service Management.
Completion of the Cherwell's Administration Foundation's course.

91b8396b-45b9-4676-89fa-7a9071b2a514.description: Individuals that have earned the Cherwell Certified Professional Developer (CCPD) certification have obtained the required knowledge and technical skills to effectively design new solutions using Cherwell's ITSM solution, Cherwell Service Management. cae0c52f-6704-4636-9f7c-32060157204a
91b8396b-45b9-4676-89fa-7a9071b2a514.name: Cherwell Certified Professional Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Pass an online proctored exam on designing and innovating in Cherwell Service Management.
Completion of Cherwell's Developer Essentials Course.

82104b60-9d0b-4802-acaa-a73d8dc90f0a.description: Earners of the Cherwell Certified Professional Engineer (CCPE) certification have obtained the required knowledge and skills to successfully lead and run a full Cherwell Service Management Implementation.
82104b60-9d0b-4802-acaa-a73d8dc90f0a.name: Cherwell Certified Professional Engineer

badge_template_activities.title: Obtain the Cherwell Certified Professional Engineer Associate (CCPEA) Certification
Complete the fifteen (15) required Video Learning Library modules within the Cherwell Certified Professional Engineer Learning Path.
Satisfactorily complete the graded Design Exercise within the Cherwell Certified Professional Engineer learning path.

582cefd3-e35d-40ab-a3af-5a23b356fa0c.description: Individuals that have earned the Cherwell Certified Professional Engineer Associate (CCPEA) certification obtained the skills required to perform the initial configuration and set-up of the Cherwell Service Management Out-Of-the-Box system. d09c0fc8-4d47-4b57-a1ab-84e71a72866
582cefd3-e35d-40ab-a3af-5a23b356fa0c.name: Cherwell Certified Professional Engineer Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the six (6) required prerequisite courses in the Cherwell Certified Engineer Associate Learning Path.
Pass an online proctored exam on setting up Cherwell Service Management.

37bb3496-a6ef-4747-a982-da2fc302e328.description: Individuals of the Cherwell Certified Professional Support (CCPS) certification have obtained the required knowledge and skills to provide effective Support for customers using Cherwell Service Management software.
37bb3496-a6ef-4747-a982-da2fc302e328.name: Cherwell Certified Professional Support

badge_template_activities.title: Obtain the Cherwell Certified Professional Engineer Associate (CCPEA) Certification
Complete the three (3) Technical Support call courses in the Cherwell Certified Professional Support Learning Path.
Pass an exam on supporting Cherwell Service Management customers.

24b2af25-8dbf-4ae1-ac8f-760a74af7eee.description: Organizations that have earned Cherwell's Associate Technology Alliance Partner (TAP) Badge are partners who have built an integration with Cherwell or have an integration in development. Associate TAPs help grow Cherwell's technology ecosystem which enables customers to improve visibility, agility, automation and self-service across the enterprise. Associate is the entry-level tier for Cherwell's Technology Alliance Partner program.
24b2af25-8dbf-4ae1-ac8f-760a74af7eee.name: Cherwell Technology Alliance Partner: Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Commit to a timeline to build an integration or have a generally available integration through Cherwell’s Marketplace or partner’s own app store or integration directory.

3f12f70a-5324-47eb-8fe3-0fd114fc0251.description: Organizations that have earned the Cherwell Authorized Resell Partner designation can address customer needs by reselling Cherwell solutions and providing consulting services. Elite is the highest level of Resell Partner.
3f12f70a-5324-47eb-8fe3-0fd114fc0251.name: Cherwell Authorized Resell Partner: Elite

88a04988-33cd-4c9c-90a7-2a035cb10caa.description: Organizations that have earned the Cherwell Authorized Resell Partner designation can address customer needs by reselling Cherwell solutions and providing consulting services. Premier is the second level of Resell Partner.
88a04988-33cd-4c9c-90a7-2a035cb10caa.name: Cherwell Authorized Resell Partner: Premier

4b51fc0d-dd62-45e0-be24-7feccf835d63.description: Organizations that have earned the Cherwell Authorized Resell Partner designation can address customer needs by reselling Cherwell solutions and providing consulting services. Associate is the entry-level tier for Cherwell's Resell Partner Program.
4b51fc0d-dd62-45e0-be24-7feccf835d63.name: Cherwell Authorized Resell Partner: Associate

4958fbaa-04b0-42ac-9890-a69326c034c0.description: Organizations that have earned the Cherwell Authorized Support Partner designation can provide Level 1 and Level 2 Support to Customers pertaining to the Licensed Software and non-Cherwell products and services our partners provide. Associate is the entry-level tier for Cherwell's Support Partner Program.
4958fbaa-04b0-42ac-9890-a69326c034c0.name: Cherwell Authorized Support Partner: Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Company must employee two (2) Cherwell Certified Professional Support personnel.

006fafed-3afb-4eaa-a7b0-0fe2776e8d0f.description: Organizations that have earned Cherwell's Premier Technology Alliance (TAP) Badge are partners who have two publicly referenceable customers using the integration between their technology and Cherwell's. The partner has demonstrated strong market presence for influential co-marketing and co-selling activities and has completed the Accredited Alliance Partner Professional Learning Path. Premier is the second level of Technology Alliance Partner.
006fafed-3afb-4eaa-a7b0-0fe2776e8d0f.name: Cherwell Technology Alliance Partner: Premier

badge_template_activities.title: Commit to a timeline to build an integration or have a generally available integration through Cherwell’s Marketplace or partner’s own app store or integration directory.
Secure at least two publicly referenceable customers of the joint solution and develop a joint go-to-market plan.
A minimum of one technical resource who has completed the Cherwell Accredited Alliance Partner Professional Path within 60 days of signing the TAP agreement.

ffdf91e4-3b1f-4657-8407-27c732eba836.description: Organizations that have earned the Cherwell Authorized Delivery Partner designation can provide consulting resources that are skilled with practical knowledge and best practices to ensure customers gain the most value from their Cherwell solution. Elite is the highest level of Delivery Partner.
ffdf91e4-3b1f-4657-8407-27c732eba836.name: Cherwell Authorized Delivery Partner: Elite

a25e22c6-2e4d-4f65-9aa7-d22473d10e84.description: Organizations that have been invited to participate in Cherwell's Technology Alliance Partner Program at the Elite level are market leaders that offer significant value to Cherwell's current and future customer base. Elite is the highest level of Technology Alliance Partner.
a25e22c6-2e4d-4f65-9aa7-d22473d10e84.name: Cherwell Technology Alliance Partner: Elite

b1d4fcb4-cf4f-4898-a7d3-34fe70a95d3a.description: Organizations that have earned the Cherwell Authorized Delivery Partner designation can provide consulting resources that are skilled with practical knowledge and best practices to ensure customers gain the most value from their Cherwell solution. Associate is the entry-level tier for Cherwell's Delivery Partner Program.
b1d4fcb4-cf4f-4898-a7d3-34fe70a95d3a.name: Cherwell Authorized Delivery Partner: Associate

c1957082-a2c7-4b1a-bb93-e9fb7a52232e.description: Organizations that have earned the Cherwell Authorized Support Partner designation can provide Level 1 and Level 2 Support to Customers pertaining to the Licensed Software and non-Cherwell products and services our partners provide. Elite is the highest level of Cherwell's Support Partner Program.
c1957082-a2c7-4b1a-bb93-e9fb7a52232e.name: Cherwell Authorized Support Partner: Elite

badge_template_activities.title: Company must employee eight (8) Cherwell Certified Professional Support personnel.

ed2affcd-1f05-4e60-a55c-131d85d4ea2d.description: Organizations that have earned the Cherwell Authorized Support Partner designation can provide Level 1 and Level 2 Support to Customers pertaining to the Licensed Software and non-Cherwell products and services our partners provide. Premier is the second level of Cherwell's Support Partner Program.
ed2affcd-1f05-4e60-a55c-131d85d4ea2d.name: Cherwell Authorized Support Partner: Premier

badge_template_activities.title: Company must employee five (5) Cherwell Certified Professional Support personnel.

28e75884-5841-45b7-a87b-b61164eff227.description: Earners of the Cherwell Certified Professional Instructor (CCPI) certification have developed the skills to deliver live training of Cherwell - approved courses to their own customers.
28e75884-5841-45b7-a87b-b61164eff227.name: Cherwell Certified Professional Instructor

b4efb32b-f9a6-4fbe-8eea-7cec4b8b7c8f.description: Organizations that have earned the Cherwell Managed Service Provider (MSP) designation may disclose they integrate Cherwell solutions within their managed service offerings. MSPs leverage Cherwell's Enterprise Service Management solutions in their own operations and to provide their end-customers with improved visibility, agility, automation and self-service across their IT and business processes.
b4efb32b-f9a6-4fbe-8eea-7cec4b8b7c8f.name: Cherwell Authorized Managed Service Provider
